mods.abstract: DETAINED in the jail of the parish of St John the Baptist, a negro man named NED, he says he belongs to Mr. Jos. Reedes of Jackson city, (Mississippi.) This negro of a dark complexion is aged about 29 years, 5 feet 10 in. high. The owner thereof is requested to claim said boys according to law. St John the Baptist, may 26th 1855. NUMA TREPAGNIER. Deputy Sheriff.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
